div.div: Four representative wetlands in Mt. Rainier National Park, WA (a-d) and in Olympic National Park, WA (e-h) for ephemeral hydroperiod (a,e), intermediate hydroperiod(b,f), perennial (c,g) and permanent wetland (d,h).
div.p: Solid circles show observed data that are used for developing regression model and calculating R 2 values and open circles are remaining observed data. Blue lines are simulated wetland levels.
